hypot

Square root of sum of squares

Syntax

C = hypot(A, B)

Input argument

A

a variable: scalars, vectors, matrices, multidimensional arrays single or double

B

a variable: scalars, vectors, matrices, multidimensional arrays single or double

Output argument

R

result of hypot: hypothenuse.

Description

hypot computes the hypothenuse.

If one or both inputs is NaN, then hypot returns NaN.

Example

R = hypot(1e308, 1e308)
R = hypot(1e309, 1e309)

See also

abs, sqrt.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
